headline.main: Serbian Director Lazar Stojanovic Dies at 73
headline.print_headline: Serbian Director Lazar Stojanovic Dies at 73

lead_paragraph: Lazar Stojanovic, a Serbian film director who was jailed under communism and was an anti-war activist during the 1990s, has died. He was 73.
snippet: Lazar Stojanovic, a Serbian film director who was jailed under communism and was an anti-war activist during the 1990s, has died. He was 73....
